Zach Wilson wasn’t good, and to be real, he was bad. Indecisive, inaccurate, threw a pick, held the ball a lot 

But it’s only practice. It’s first first day back in a while. Not the end of the world. How he bounces back tomorrow is what’s important. 

#Jets

- Cam Newton eclipsed Mac Jones late, with the rookie completing 2 of his last 9 passes in team drills. 
- Newton 9/15, Jones 8/15, Hoyer 11/13.
- Newton led all 11-on-11 and 7-on-7 periods again.
- PBUs: Williams, Langi.
- Drops: Meyers.

text:
@nflnetwork Aaron Rodgers says he thought about retirement. Enjoyed offseason away. But as he got back into workouts he realized: "I know I can still play, and I want to still play." 

At the same age, Brett Favre said goodbye with the words: "I know I can play, but I don't think I want to."
